body.name: Steamer for Clothes Wrinkle Removes, Portable Handheld Garment Steamer, Clothes Steamer, Hat Steamer for Home and Travel with Automatic Shut-Off Safety Protection,180ML (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 mins
features: 【100% Two-Year Warranty】Great customer service, if you have any problems wiht the item, our customer service team will solve your problems within 24-hours.

【Latest Technology】 - Updated steam channeling design delivers steam more powerfully and evenly to remove the toughest wrinkles from a multitude of fabrics in drapery, clothing, and much more. Stay dry and safe thanks to the upgraded Spill-Proof Technology and Automatic Safety Shutdown System!

【Wrinkle Removal】 - Based on the latest technology and powerful power, Heats up in 120 seconds and continuous steam for 10 minutes. De-wrinkles any garment quickly and easily, including upholstery, bedding, tablecloth and more.

【High Quality Materials】 - High-power aluminum heating ball heats up quickly. The material of the tank is high temperature resistant PC, and the material of the outer casing is strong mechanical strength ABS.Built-in automatic reset fuse ensures no short circuit. And the double-layer insulation UL-certified wire ensures the safety of the entire product.

【Take It Wherever You Go】 - Portable and small frame. The garment steamer is only 1.5lb in weight. Carry it with you anywhere, anytime! Perfect for household,business trips,vacations or any other place everywhere and anytime.

Notes: Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended.(not exceed the maximum level line)If you encounter product failure or water spray, please immediately contact our after-sales customer service team for commodity replacement service.
Tip for use: After use, remember to unplug the power and pour out the remaining water in the sink.
body.description: Item Weight: 1.5 pounds. Water Tank Capacity: 180 milliliters. Steam ready time: 90 seconds Steam Duration: 10 minutes. Voltage: 110V - 120V Wattage: 700W - 800W Do you have problems with clothes wrinkles in your daily life Now we strongly recommend this handheld steamer It can also use to remove wrinkles in clothes, cushions, beds and other fabrics around the house. Easy Operation: 1. Rotate the nozzle head, and open the steamer. And then fill the tank with cold water to the desired level(not exceed the maximum level line). When you finish filling, lock the head back on. 2. Turn the ON/OFF switch to the ON position. The switch light indicates the steamer is on. The steamer will emit steam from nozzle in 2 minutes. 3. After about 10 minutes of continuous steaming, or the steamer runs out of the water, it will reset automatically to ensure your safety while leaving the indicator light ON. 4. When you are finished with your steaming session place the ON/OFF switch in the OFF position and remove the plug from the outlet. Notes: 1. Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended. 2. Never turn the unit upside down. Your Travel Garment Steamer should never be tilted past a 45-degree angle especially when the unit is ON. Never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself. 3. Please use a transformer that can convert the voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Become a Better You Ironing, softening and sterilizing clothes with our MASTEAM steamer. Just take a few minutes a day to make yourself look better. No more fear of making a bad impression on others.

Portable Steamer for Home & Travel Masteam steamer has the U.S electrical safety certification. Spill-Proof design and Automatic turn-off safety protection ensure safety. MASTEAM travel steamer weighs only 1.4 lb. Comparable to the size of an iPad. Easy to use and store, you can easily to hold with one hand which is perfect for your holidays or business trips. Suitable for all kind of fabrics, such as satin, cotton, wool, linen, silk, fiber, polyester, embroidery, bedding, curtain, and more! Keep your clothes in top condition and you will become a better person.

Warm Tips The garment steamer should never be tilted past a 45-degree especially when the unit is ON. Please do not add water over the Max water line. The mist is super hot, please keep away from the hot steam. Please use a transformer which can convert the voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

Fast Response Masteam attaches great importance to product quality and aims to bring better user experience to customers. We're confident in the quality of our product that we offer Product malfunction 2-years of free sent of new replacement.Any problems in further, we will respond within 24H and try our best to service you.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hand held steamer
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Lightweight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This works perfect for all of my clothes, I don’t like to iron and this is a great alternative leaves the clothes wrinkle free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good For My Blouses
reviews.reviewText: This is the first steamer I've ever owned. It works fairly decent for shirts/blouses (that's what I bought it for primarily), not sure how it would work on heavier and larger items. It does take a while to get the wrinkles & creases out and you have to hold up right next to the fabric. Maybe this is how they all work. Overall, it works for what I currently need it for, however, I may buy a larger more powerful one in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly does the job
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate products that ease my life, and this is one of them. Every household should own one. And as for the price, it’s worth every penny 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and steams so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Started leaking after almost 2 months
reviews.reviewText: I was very content with the product when I initially purchased it, but recently I noticed blue bubbles on the area that heats up. I didn't think much of it and scrubbed it with a toothbrush, but a white stain remained. I poured water inside like usual and suddenly I heard a weird noise and water started leaking from the bottom and it truly sounded like it was going to explode. I immediately disconnected the steamer from the outlet and came to Amazon to request a refund. Turns out that the return window closed and now I can no longer use this product. Would not recommend.
